content.rendered:
Directed by Balaji Mohan.

Written by Rishabh Purohit.

Cast Dhanush(Maari). Kreshna(Kalai). Sai Pallavi(Aanandhi). Varalaxmi Sarathkumar(Vijaya Chamundeeswari). Tovino Thomas(Beeja). Robo Shankar(Sani Kizhamai). Kalloori Vinoth(Adithangi). Manobala(Kaali’s Teacher). Aadukalam Naren(Police Commissioner). Sangili Murugan(House Owner). E. Ramdoss(Police Assistant Commissioner). Ajay Ghosh(Singayya). Avinash Raghudevan(Kalai’s Brother). Raaghavan Murugan(Kaali (as Master Raghavan)). Kaali Venkat(Arumugham). Aranthangi Nisha(Attu Anandhi (as Arandhangi Nisha)). Vincent Ashokan(Beeja’s Brother). Vidya Pradeep(Kalai’s Wife). Stalin(Councillor). Sethu Lakshmi(House Owner). Stunt Silva(Goon). Pasi Sathya(Nurse). Rock Prabhu(Police Inspector) .Vishwa Kumar.Sujeet Kumar Sharma

Language Tamil.

Producers Dhanush. S. Vinod Kumar.

Production Goldmines Telefilms. Wunderbar Films.
